Good catch.  I took a look and figured out the problem.  We should be able to sneak this one in for M4.

Fixed the NPE by getting the version from the IPluginBase instead of the BundleDescription.  Also added a check in the properties dialog so that way when the user opens the dialog on 'system.bundle', we don't list any existing bundles (since system.bundle does not actually refer to a particular bundle).

Will be available in 3.4M4.
